required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pilot Clinical Trial of Repeated Doses of Macimorelin to Assess Safety and Efficacy in Patients With Cancer Cachexia
clinical_study.official_title: Pilot Clinical Trial of Repeated Doses of Macimorelin to Assess Safety and Efficacy in Patients With Cancer Cachexia

collaborator.agency: VA Office of Research and Development

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of repeated oral administration of macimorelin at different doses daily for 1 week for the treatment of cancer cachexia.

primary_outcome.description: The change of body weight(kg)will be measured between day 1 and day 7.
The change of IGF-1 plasma levels will be measured between day 1 (prior to dosing) and day 7.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of quality of life score
primary_outcome.description: The change of quality of life score (Anderson Symptom Assessment Scale, FACIT-F) will be measured between day 1 and day 7.

secondary_outcome.description: Food intake as measured by a food diary to be recorded for 3 days before days 1 and 7 and by a test meal done at screening and on day 7.
Change of appetite measured by a validated visual analogue scale between day 1 and day 7.
Body composition as measured by bio-impedance and dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry on days 1 and 7.
Muscle strength as measured by handgrip strength and stair climbing power.

secondary_outcome.measure: Energy expenditure as measured by indirect calorimetry.
secondary_outcome.description: Energy expenditure as measured by indirect calorimetry.
Change in IGFBP-3, GH, CRP, IL-6, TNF-α and glucose between day 1 and day 7.
Changes in reward from food as measured by brain functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging (fMRI).
Changes in functional brain connectivity as assessed by Resting State Functional Connectivity (RSFC) imaging and Diffusion Tensor Imaging (DTI).
Clinical laboratory parameters: complete blood count (CBC), comprehensive metabolic panel (CMP), urinalysis (UA)
Electrocardiogram (ECG) at days 1 and 7 before and 1 hour after dosing and on the post-study visit.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Adverse Events as a Measure of Safety and Tolerability
secondary_outcome.description: Recording of any adverse events from day 1 to day 7.

intervention.description: Subjects will receive macimorelin (1 mg/kg) and matching placebo (Powerade®) daily for 7 days.

overall_official.affiliation: University of Washington and Veterans Affairs Puget Sound Health Care System

facility.name: Veterans Affairs Puget Sound Health Care System
